org.apache.flink.streaming.api.operators

类 HeapInternalTimerService<K,N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.operators.HeapInternalTimerService<K,N>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    InternalTimerService<N>, ProcessingTimeCallback

    public class HeapInternalTimerService<K,N>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InternalTimerService<N>, ProcessingTimeCallback
    InternalTimerService that stores timers on the Java heap.

    • 方法详细资料

      • startTimerService

        public void startTimerService(TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                              TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer,
                              Triggerable<K,N> triggerTarget)
        Starts the local HeapInternalTimerService by:
        1. Setting the keySerialized and namespaceSerializer for the timers it will contain.
        2. Setting the triggerTarget which contains the action to be performed when a timer fires.
        3. Re-registering timers that were retrieved after recoveting from a node failure, if any.
        This method can be called multiple times, as long as it is called with the same serializers.

      • onProcessingTime

        public void onProcessingTime(long time)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: ProcessingTimeCallback
        This method is invoked with the timestamp for which the trigger was scheduled.

        If the triggering is delayed for whatever reason (trigger timer was blocked, JVM stalled due to a garbage collection), the timestamp supplied to this function will still be the original timestamp for which the trigger was scheduled.

        指定者:
        onProcessingTime 在接口中 ProcessingTimeCallback
        参数:
        time - The timestamp for which the trigger event was scheduled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • snapshotTimersForKeyGroup

        public InternalTimersSnapshot<K,N> snapshotTimersForKeyGroup(int keyGroupIdx)
        Snapshots the timers (both processing and event time ones) for a given keyGroupIdx.
        参数:
        keyGroupIdx - the id of the key-group to be put in the snapshot.
        返回:
        a snapshot containing the timers for the given key-group, and the serializers for them

      • restoreTimersForKeyGroup

        public void restoreTimersForKeyGroup(InternalTimersSnapshot<?,?> restoredTimersSnapshot,
                                     int keyGroupIdx)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Restore the timers (both processing and event time ones) for a given keyGroupIdx.
        参数:
        restoredTimersSnapshot - the restored snapshot containing the key-group's timers, and the serializers that were used to write them
        keyGroupIdx - the id of the key-group to be put in the snapshot.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • getIndexForKeyGroup

        private int getIndexForKeyGroup(int keyGroupIdx)
        Computes the index of the requested key-group in the local datastructures.
      • Currently we assume that each task is assigned a continuous range of key-groups, e.g. 1,2,3,4, and not 1,3,5. We leverage this to keep the different states by key-grouped in arrays instead of maps, where the offset for each key-group is the key-group id (an int) minus the id of the first key-group in the local range. This is for performance reasons.
